Package org.apache.arrow.driver.jdbc

Class ArrowFlightJdbcConnectionPoolDataSource

java.lang.Object
org.apache.arrow.driver.jdbc.ArrowFlightJdbcDataSource
org.apache.arrow.driver.jdbc.ArrowFlightJdbcConnectionPoolDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Wrapper, EventListener, CommonDataSource, ConnectionEventListener, ConnectionPoolDataSource, DataSource
public class ArrowFlightJdbcConnectionPoolDataSource extends ArrowFlightJdbcDataSource implements ConnectionPoolDataSource, ConnectionEventListener, AutoCloseable
ConnectionPoolDataSource implementation for Arrow Flight JDBC Driver.
